Package space.sunqian.common.runtime.proxy

Interface ProxyMaker

All Known Implementing Classes:
AsmProxyMaker, JdkProxyMaker
@ThreadSafe public interface ProxyMaker
This interface is used to create proxy class for the specified proxied class and interfaces. The implementations should be thread-safe.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static @Nonnull AsmProxyMaker
    byAsm()
    Returns an instance of AsmProxyMaker which implements the ProxyMaker.
    static @Nonnull JdkProxyMaker
    byJdk()
    Returns an instance of JdkProxyMaker which implements the ProxyMaker.
    @Nonnull ProxySpec
    make(@Nullable Class<?> proxiedClass, @Nonnull @RetainedParam List<@Nonnull Class<?>> interfaces, @Nonnull ProxyHandler proxyHandler)
    Creates a new ProxySpec instance for the specified proxied class and interfaces, with the specified proxy handler.

  • Method Details

    • byAsm

      @Nonnull static @Nonnull AsmProxyMaker byAsm()
      Returns an instance of AsmProxyMaker which implements the ProxyMaker.
      Returns:
      an instance of AsmProxyMaker which implements the ProxyMaker

    • byJdk

      @Nonnull static @Nonnull JdkProxyMaker byJdk()
      Returns an instance of JdkProxyMaker which implements the ProxyMaker.

    • make

      @Nonnull @Nonnull ProxySpec make(@Nullable @Nullable Class<?> proxiedClass, @Nonnull @RetainedParam @Nonnull @RetainedParam List<@Nonnull Class<?>> interfaces, @Nonnull @Nonnull ProxyHandler proxyHandler) throws ProxyException
      Creates a new ProxySpec instance for the specified proxied class and interfaces, with the specified proxy handler.
      Parameters:
      proxiedClass - the specified class to be proxied, may be null if it is Object
      interfaces - the interfaces to be proxied, may be empty (note it is annotated by RetainedParam)
      proxyHandler - the specified proxy handler
      Returns:
      a new ProxySpec instance to create proxy instances
      Throws:
      ProxyException - if any problem occurs during creation
